entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers or wet flurries changing to 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Snow beginning before morning. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill near minus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow mixed with rain. High plus 3.

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 8. POP 40%
